name: KARUK TRIBE
sampleDescriptions: Seek passage of legislation to transfer approximately 1600 acres of Forest Service lands to the Secretary of Interior to be held in Trust for the benefit of the Karuk Tribe.

Seeking passage of legislation to transfer approximately 1600 acres of U.S. Forest Service lands to the Secretary of Interior to be held in Trust for the benefit of the Karuk Tribe, including meetings
